entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lac Raglan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:07 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -31.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -31.7°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -37.4°C
Wind: WNW 28 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 31.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 49 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
